property.name: fatalError
property.doc: Error message for TMC603A

property.name: torsionLimits
property.doc: The minimum and maximum torsion limits in radiant

property.name: outputPositionLimits
property.doc: The minimum and maximum output position limits in radiant

property.name: errorState
property.doc: Error state of the drive

property.name: tmc603aError
property.doc: Error message for TMC603A

property.name: tmc603aErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for TMC603A is enabled.

property.name: watchdogTimerError
property.doc: Error message for watchdog timer error.

property.name: watchdogTimerErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for watchdog timer is enabled .

property.name: communicationTimeoutError
property.doc: Error message for communication timeout error.

property.name: communicationTimeoutErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for communication timeout is enabled .

property.name: torsionMeasurementError
property.doc: Error message for torsion measurement error.

property.name: torsionMeasurementErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for torsion measurement is enabled .

property.name: outputPositionMeasurementError
property.doc: Error message for output position measurement error.

property.name: outputPositionMeasurementErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for TMC603A is enabled .

property.name: overvoltageError
property.doc: Error message for overvoltage error.

property.name: overvoltageErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for overvoltage is enabled .

property.name: undervoltageError
property.doc: Error message for undervoltage error.

property.name: undervoltageErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for undervoltage is enabled .

property.name: rotorOvertemperatureError
property.doc: Error message for rotor overtemperature error.

property.name: rotorOvertemperatureErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for rotor overtemperature is enabled .

property.name: driverOvertemperatureError
property.doc: Error message for driver overtemperature error.

property.name: driverOvertemperatureErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for driver overtemperature is enabled .

property.name: inputPositionError
property.doc: Error message for input position error.

property.name: inputPositionErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for input position is enabled .

property.name: torsionError
property.doc: Error message for torsion error.

property.name: torsionErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for torsion is enabled .

property.name: outputPositionError
property.doc: Error message for output position error.

property.name: outputPositionErrorEnabled
property.doc: Check if error messaging for output position is enabled .

property.name: i2cError
property.doc: Error message for i2c error.

property.doc: Check if error messaging for i2c is enabled .

property.doc: Error message for output position measurement error.
